parent_ticket.summary: QX YYYY - Quarterly ASV External Scan
parent_ticket.description:
Root ticket for tracking the remediation efforts for the quarterly external asv scan.

* Please see linked tickets for individual vulnerability information.
* Subtasks are for ensuring the proper steps are taken each quarter.

ip_verification.summary: Request Verification of External IP Address List from Network Manager

vulnerability_remediation.description: See linked tickets for vulnerability information.

false_positive_review_and_approval.description: Describe who is required for review and approval and how to request it.

submit_to_asv_workbench.summary: Submit Scan to ASV Workbench in Tenable

dispute_issues.summary: Dispute Issues with Tenable ASV Scanning Team (if needed)

upload_to_asv_drive_folder.summary: Upload Results to ASV Scan Drive Folder
upload_to_asv_drive_folder.description:
Link to ASV Scan Drive Folder (special permissions required to view):
<<URL>>

add_scan_data_to_root_ticket.summary: Upload Scan Data to Root Ticket
add_scan_data_to_root_ticket.description:
The following should be uploaded to the root ticket:
* Initial ASV Scan Results
* Completed ASV Attestation
